data_structures_prompts.title: Basic Stack Implementation
data_structures_prompts.prompt: Write a Python class to implement a basic stack with push, pop, and peek methods.

data_structures_prompts.title: Queue Implementation
data_structures_prompts.prompt: Write a Python class to implement a basic queue with enqueue, dequeue, and peek methods.

data_structures_prompts.title: Linked List Implementation
data_structures_prompts.prompt: Write a Python class to implement a singly linked list with methods to insert, delete, and search for elements.

data_structures_prompts.title: Binary Search Tree Implementation
data_structures_prompts.prompt: Write a Python class to implement a binary search tree with methods to insert, delete, and search for elements.

data_structures_prompts.title: Graph Implementation
data_structures_prompts.prompt: Write a Python class to implement an undirected graph using an adjacency list. Include methods to add a vertex, add an edge, and perform a depth-first search.

data_structures_prompts.title: Hash Table Implementation
data_structures_prompts.prompt: Write a Python class to implement a basic hash table with methods to insert, delete, and search for elements.
